job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Force-X is seeking a Software Engineer for our client in Suwanee, GA. This is a full-time, Direct Hire position.QUALIFICATIONS:Requires at least 1 year relevant experience.Must be a US person (US citizen or Green Card)Adaptable, Flexible, Ability to Learn – must be able to work with different architecture and software Experience with creative problem-solving – must be able to overcome obstacles with a unique perspective to benefit the teamTeam Player – must be able to accept a role in a team and work well together, sharing goals, effort, and not afraid to ask for assistanceExperience with C++ and C# programming.Experience with 3D software development (Gaming, Simulation, or Commercial) – experience in using modern 3D development software and understanding of engine-related optimization, limitation, and strengths.Experience with object-oriented and component-oriented programming.Experience with database management – interfacing with a database to external software for handling large amounts of save/load, and data managementExperience of programing with 3rd party SDK and API – utilizing 3rd party hardware and softwareExperience with Unity – as well as packages, C#, and prefab managementEDUCATION: Engineering degree in computer science or relevant field
